Package org.akubraproject.impl

Akubra store implementation support classes.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
CloseListener Receives notification when Closeable objects are closed.
 

Class Summary
AbstractBlob An abstract base class for Blobs.
AbstractBlobStore An abstract BlobStore implementation.
AbstractBlobStoreConnection An abstract base class for blob store connections.
BlobStoreConnectionWrapper Simple wrapper implementation that delegates listBlobIds and sync calls to the wrapped blob-store-connection, and implements close to close both this connection and the underlying connection.
BlobWrapper Simple wrapper implementation that delegates all calls to the wrapped blob.
StreamManager Utility class that tracks the open streams of a BlobStore.
 

Package org.akubraproject.impl Description

Akubra store implementation support classes.
